svg.text: SAGA PRYOR DATA CENTER - ELECTRICAL SINGLE LINE DIAGRAM
13.8kV Dual-Feed MV Distribution | SLD Standards v1.1 Compliant
1. RMU dual-feed topology: 2 incomers (Primary + Reserve) with separated pathways, 1 outgoer per TX
2. Transformers: 8 transformers, each feeding dedicated LV-SWBD (1:1 relationship per BOD)
3. LV-SWBDs: 200px wide with 5 breaker positions, all downstream connections from bottom
4. Ring bus pathways: 30px minimum separation for clear path delineation
5. Symmetrical spacing: All equipment positions calculated for equal distribution (v1.1 Section 2.2)
6. IEEE Std 315 / IEC 60617 compliant symbols | Total IT: 6.2MVA | Mech: 2.0MW
